freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Resource

Description

The Resource interface provides access to a resource as visible from the OUsage subsystem. If a resource is to be provided for OUsage, this interface has to be implemented. Applications usually are not allowed to use this interface directly, they will solely interact using the org.freesmartphone.Usage API.

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Resource

Methods

  • Enable
  • Disable
  • Suspend
  • Resume

Signals

None

Errors

  • NotEnabled

Methods

Enable ( )

Description: Enable the resource.

Disable ( )

Description: Disable the resource.

Suspend ( )

Description: Suspend the resource.

Resume ( )

Description: Resume the resource.

Errors

NotEnabled

Description: Raised, if the resource is not enabled.
